description:
Keeper Commander is a python-based CLI and SDK interface to the Keeper Security platform. Provides administrative controls, reporting, import/export and vault management.

Keeper Commander is a command-line and SDK interface to KeeperÂ® Password Manager. Commander can be used to access and control your Keeper vault, perform administrative functions (such as end-user onboarding and data import/export), launch remote sessions, rotate passwords, eliminate hardcoded passwords and more. Keeper Commander is an open source project with contributions from Keeper's engineering team and partners.
Keeper Commander release version v17.0.5Fixes / Improvements
- switch-to-mc command: fix for EC-Only MSP
- pam legacy command: switch to PAMv1 command set
- pam config command: remote browser isolation
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Keeper-Security/Commander/compare/v17.0.4...v17.0.5
